message.content:
cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.LO, cs.CC

Reasoning: 
- cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory) is the most likely category as the paper deals with regular languages and their automata.
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses the complexity of various operations on regular languages.
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is relevant as the paper mentions the size of the largest syntactic semigroup.
- cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) is relevant as the paper defines a structure (suffix-convex triple system) to characterize the automata recognizing suffix-convex languages.
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is relevant as the paper discusses upper bounds on the complexity of various operations on regular languages.
